page.description: The .INSERT_ENDIF() method inserts an ENDIF operator at the cursor location.
page.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.set_cursor(10) obj.rtf.insert_else("") obj.rtf.insert_elseif("") obj.rtf.insert_endif("") obj.rtf.insert_if("") obj.rtf.insert_if_unpaired("") obj.rtf.insert_ifelse("") obj.rtf.insert_ifelse_unpaired("")
